Flow.description: It creates a liability claim and links it the a case

Flow.label: LIA Create Liability Claim

recordCreates.description: Creates the liability claim with the information capture in the screen
recordCreates.name: Create_Liability_Claim
recordCreates.label: Create Liability Claim

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
{!providedEmail} is not a valid email address and the liability claim cannot be created.

Please enter a valid email address in order to create the liability claim.

fields.name: screenMessage
fields.fieldText:
Is this a new Liability claim?


If yes, click next

fields.name: CARE_Case_Number
fields.helpText: Please add the complain CARE Case Number

validationRule.errorMessage: There is limit of 100 characters for this field
PNR is 6 characters

fields.name: Flight_Number
fields.helpText: Please add the flight number related to the PNR

validationRule.errorMessage: There is limit of 50 characters for this field

fields.name: Flight_Date
fields.helpText: Please add the flight number related to the PNR

fields.name: CourtInfo
fields.fieldText: Court Information

validationRule.errorMessage: There is limit of 100 characters for this field
BIC/SWIFT cannot be more than 11 characters. BIC/SWIFT should be formatted as: XXXXXXYY or XXXXXXYYYYY (X\'s are letters, Y\'s are letters or numbers)
Bank Account Number cannot be more than 35 characters.

fields.name: FinalMessage
fields.fieldText: Liability Claim has been created

variables.description: Case Id when the flow is called from
